name.type.description: The תוכן סוג of the QR code to be generated, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.failure.description: The כשל סטטוס of the משימה

name.failureReason.description: The סיבה for the משימה כשל

name.traceId.description: The מעקב ID of the משימה

name.size.description: The גודל of the QR code to be generated

name.createdAt.description: The date and time the QR code was generated

name.pixelStyle.description: The pixel style of the QR code to be generated

name.startImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.videoUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.endImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.paddingLevel.description: The padding רמה of the QR code to be generated

name.paddingNoise.description: The padding noise of the QR code to be generated

name.content.description: The תוכן of the QR code to be generated

name.ecl.description: The error correction רמה of the QR code to be generated

name.position.description: The position of the QR code to be generated

name.rotate.description: The rotation of the QR code to be generated

name.enhancement.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.loop.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.aspectRatio.description: The יחס ממדים of the QR code to be generated

name.markerShape.description: The marker shape of the QR code to be generated

name.subMarker.description: The sub marker of the QR code to be generated

name.qrw.description: The name of the QR code generator

name.steps.description: The number of steps to צור the QR code

name.preset.description: The preset for the QR code to be generated

name.lumaBot.description: The name of the Luma וידאו generator

name.contentImageUrl.description: The תוכן תמונה URL of the QR code to be generated

description.enhancement.message: לא בטוחים איך לנסח? הפעילו שיפור פרומפט לעזרה בניסוח.

description.custom.message: רוצים להעלות וידאו משלכם ולהאריך ממנו? הפעילו את הכפתור הזה.

description.startImageUrl.message: The URL of the start תמונה, which will be the first frame of the generated וידאו.

description.videoUrl.message: The URL of the uploaded custom extended וידאו, which will be the extended וידאו.

description.endImageUrl.message: The URL of the end תמונה, which will be the last frame of the generated וידאו.

status.pending.description: The waiting סטטוס of the משימה

status.processing.description: The בעיבוד סטטוס of the משימה

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can העלאה up to 5 images

message.uploadReferencesError.message: העלאה נכשלה — נסו שוב בעוד קצת
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when תמונה העלאה fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing משימה starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when the משימה is successfully initiated

message.startTaskFailed.message: משימה initiation נכשל, נא contact the administrator

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, נא purchase more credits to continue using

message.generating.description: Message displayed while the תמונה is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message displayed while the תמונה is being generated

message.generateFailed.description: Message displayed when תמונה generation fails

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of first frame images

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded file גודל exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file is not in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of first frame images

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of last frame images

message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when the first frame תמונה העלאה fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when the וידאו העלאה fails

message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when the last frame תמונה העלאה fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when the document העלאה fails

message.noOperations.description: Message displayed when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No history tasks, נא click to צור וידאו on the left
